Text.Page:
You successfully arrived inside Exodor, but Titus is missing.
Speak with Amarre and discuss what to do next.

<PCNAME> found Elleon inside Exodor. Elleon offers information about the Black Core and the kidnapped villagers. With a clue to stop Exodor, <PCNAME> decides to help Elleon rescue the kidnapped villagers.

! Take a look at this Murderwing. It used all its energy flying all the way here.

One burst of energy, flying back to its home, and now in dying, it turns into a jewel...isn't it such a dramatic death?
"Wait! Titus isn't here."

Ah! Right! Titus! We need his explosives if we're going to blow all of this up.

I'm sure he'll show up. What if we just wander and observe these crystals...

Just look at the size of them! How many butterfly corpses did this cost?

Did you notice that once the butterflies are dead, they become a solid crystal? I decided to call this phenomenon the crystallization.

It's interesting that these little crabbers are eating the butterfly corpses.

If I can find out what happens to the crabbers after eating the crystalized corpse, I'm certain that it would help us find a cure.

So please get some samples of the Crabbers for me.

This should be enough to continue my research.

Thank you so much."Can we look for Titus now?"

What?! ! Did you see that? Someone's over there! I think that was Titus!

Go see. Hurry.

, it's a pleasure to see you here. We were dying for help.

Defeating Gossamer Regent did not stop people from disappearing.

I snuck onto the airship when the villagers were being kidnapped.

But...how did you get in here?"The butterfly stroke..."

I see. Stopping Exodor... I have a few ideas. Let me show you.

Follow me.

This is it. Jelena and I call it the Black Core.

You can feel the enormous energy within it from here. That must be the energy source of Exodor."Is it destroyable?"

I suspect it's virtually impossible to destroy it from the outside. But...if Exodor was built by some entity, there might be a way.

There has to be a some kind of controlling device for the Black Core. If we destroy that device, we can stop Exodor.

We'll need Titus. You say he's missing? Let's find Jelena and ask if she saw anything.

! I never thought you'd be here!

What brings our hero all the way here?"The Exodor...Titus..."

Titus? I saw the guards taking a castanic man with them.

There was nothing I could do alone. But now, there's three of us.

I'll back you two up. , you and Elleon go in and search.
